page.title: 08Rebecca Peel's Day.
page.content: I wake up in the morning at{7.30am.} Then I get up and get dressed I go down stairs and have a bowl of shredded wheat and a piece of toast with marmalade on it.I play out on my rollerboots and then my dad drives me to school in the Maxi.At school we do maths and English.At{twelve oclock}I have my dinner. I have sandwiches for my dinner. In the afternoon we finish off our work or we paint.On Thursdays some people bake and then it's home time.At home I play out before I have my tea.I come home from school at{4} {o'clock}because we have to pick my little brother up from the baby sitter's. I have my tea and play out again until it is my{bath time.}Then I go to bed.
